column22:
1. ENG-795244 - MSP - Scavenger configuration for per-service retention and log file type
2. ENG-835588 - MSP - NDB DR solution for Fluentd PV where SMSP logs are persisted
3. UX/UI
column23:
1. Currently it seems there is no possibility to configure scavenger, which runs on fluentd pod as sidecar container, per service or log type. For different services, and even log types, we would like to have ability to use different retention config as not all logs are equally important. Scavenger provides this flexibility, but it seems we can't configure it via SMSP
2. NDB application runs inside the app k8s namespace ntnx-ndb on SMSP, while the SMSP-recommended logging components operate in the ntnx-system namespace. This setup raises some questions for us regarding how disaster recovery (NDK DR) should be handled. Based on our initial exploration of NDK, it appears that its unit of protection is scoped to one namespace (the application namespace). This implies that logs and application resources may not be protected as a single unit, which could pose challenges for backup and recovery scenarios.
